channel.title: Tinkle Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.6.0
item.description:
About v1.6.0 Update

  • ⚡️ Improvements
    • New effect colors:
      • Shock wave (light)
      • Shock wave (gray)
      • Shock wave (dark)
      • Neon (light)
      • Neon (gray)
      • Neon (dark)
    • Updated the app icon.
    • Improved preferences window layout on macOS Big Sur.

More
